title: Wolf Tooth B-RAD Roll-Top accessory bags drop weight w/ new TekLite versions
content:
Just because you need extra storage for your bike doesn’t mean it has to be heavy. Adding to their excellent family of B-RAD accessory products, Wolf Tooth Components has put their roll-top bags on a diet with the new B-RAD TekLite Roll-Top line. It’s becoming far more common to get your gear off your back, […]

The post Wolf Tooth B-RAD Roll-Top accessory bags drop weight w/ new TekLite versions appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
